required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on April 10, 2017
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Special Investigation in Patients With Intestinal Behcet's Disease (All Case Investigation)
clinical_study.official_title: Special Investigation in Patients With Intestinal Behcet's Disease (All Case Investigation)

brief_summary.textblock:
This investigation will be conducted to obtain the following information regarding the use of Adalimumab 40mg Syringe 0.8mL for Subcutaneous Injection in patients with Intestinal Behcet's Disease.
1. Incidence and conditions of occurrence of adverse reactions in clinical practice
2. Factors likely to affect the safety and effectiveness

primary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with adverse events
primary_outcome.description: Number of patients with adverse events with evaluation beginning upon administration of Adalimumab

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with overall evaluation of gastrointestinal symptoms
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluation of symptoms including Abdominal pain, Diarrhea, Abdominal fullness, Abdominal tenderness and bleeding

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with evaluation of symptoms of Behcet's disease
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluation of symptoms including Recurrent aphthous ulceration of oral mucosa, Skin symptoms, Eye symptoms, Pudendal ulcer, Arthritis without deformity or rigidity, Epididymal inflammation, Vascular and Central nervous system adverse events

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with degree of improvement of endoscopic findings

arm_group.description: Humira速 40 mg (marketed product) every other week (eow) for subcutaneous injection after initial dosage of 160 mg and 2nd dosage of 80 mg in two weeks after the initial administration

study_pop.textblock: All patients who receive Humira速 (Adalimumab) for the treatment of Intestinal Behcet's disease

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- All patients who receive Adalimumab for the treatment of Intestinal Behcet's disease (not sufficiently responsive to existing therapies, e.g. steroids, immunomodulator)
Exclusion Criteria:
Contraindications according to the Package Insert include patients who have any of the following:
- serious infections
- tuberculosis
- a history of hypersensitivity to any ingredient of Humira速
- demyelinating disease or a history of demyelinating disease
- congestive cardiac failure
